text:
Sanibonani, nonke. 

Isihloko sanamuhla sikhuluma ngokuzinakekela. 

Kunezikhathi lapho sibhekana nezikhathi ezinzima, lapho sibhekana khona nezinkinga singazi ukuthi kumelwe senzeni. Kubalulekile ukuzinakekela ukufunda izindlela zokuthi sihlale sehlise umoya uma kwenzeka kuvela inkinga, inselele noma isimo esithile. 

Uma sehlise umoya sisuke sisesimweni esihle sokucabanga kahle nokuza nesixazululo esihle sokubhekana nanoma iyiphi inkinga.
title: Ukwamukelwa Nokuzinakekela

text:
Sanibona.

Isihloko sethu namuhla ukuchitha isikhathi nezingane zethu.

Kubalulekile ukuchitha isikhathi nezingane zethu ukuze zikwazi ukusiqonda, nokuthi nathi sithole ithuba lokuziqonda. 

Khumbula, umndeni oqondana kahle uphila ngokuzwana.
title: Isikhathi Sokuthi Nibe Nobabili Ndawonye

text:
Sanibonani nonke. 

Isihloko sethu sanamuhla sikhuluma ngokuncoma. 

Kuyinto enhle ukuncoma intsha yethu uma yenze kahle ngoba uma senza kanjalo, zizokwenza okungeziwe okuhle esifuna ukukubona. 

Futhi asingakhohlwa ukuzincoma nathi uma senze kahle!
title: Ncoma

text:
Sanibonani, sanibonani nonke.

Isihloko sethu namuhla sikhuluma ngeziqondiso ezinhle. 

Kubalulekile ukunika izingane zakho iziqondiso ezinhle, ngoba uma uzinikeza iziqondiso ezinhle ziyazi futhi ziqonde ukuthi yini esilindele ukuthi ziyenze, futhi zizokwenza ngendlela esifuna ukuthi zikwenze ngayo. 

Ekugcineni, kwenza wonke umuntu ajabule.
title: Iziqondiso Ezinhle

text:
Sanibonani nonke. 

Isihloko sanamuhla sikhuluma ngokulawula ukucindezeleka. 

Kubalulekile ukukwazi ukulawula ukucindezeleka kwethu. Ngezinye izikhathi zingane zethu zingaziphatha ngendlela eyenza sicindezeleke futhi nathi njengabazali singenza izingane zethu zicindezeleke. 

Ngakho-ke, kubalulekile ukuqaphela lapho sizizwa sicindezelekile bese siyema kancane sidonse umoya. Lokho kuzokusiza ukuthi ulawule ukucindezeleka kwakho.
title: Ukulawula ukucindezeleka

text:
Sanibonani, nonke. 

Isihloko sanamuhla ibhajethi yomndeni. 

Kubalulekile ukwenza ibhajethi, kodwa okubaluleke nakakhulu ukwenza isabelomali esihlanganisa umndeni wonke. 

Ukuyenza ndawonye kukhulisa izinga lokuqonda indlela imali esentshenziswa ngayo njengomndeni nokuthi malini ozowongela umndeni wakho, ungaze wenze nezinhlelo zokuthi nizoyonga kanjani imali njengomndeni.
title: Isabelomali Somndeni

text:
Sanibonani, nonke. 

Isihloko sanamuhla imithetho. 

Imithetho ikhuthaza ukuthula ekhaya futhi ikhuthaza ukuqondana phakathi kwamalungu omndeni. 

Imithetho ithuthukisa izibopho zelungu lomndeni ngalinye, ngakho-k,e kubalulekile ukuba umndeni ube nemithetho. 

Umuzi onemithetho yomndeni uphila ngokuthula.
title: Imithetho

text:
Sanibonani, nonke. 

Isihloko sanamuhla sithi imiphumela eyethulwa ngendlela ezolile.

Kubalulekile ukuthi lapho sethula umphumela entsheni yethu siyihilele, kodwa kubalulekile nokuthi sizole lapho sethula imiphumela.

Lokhu kuzosisiza sivumelane ngokwethula imiphumela ngendlela ezolile entsheni yethu futhi intsha yethu izoyikhumbula kalula lapho ihilelwa futhi lokho kuzoyenza iziphathe kahle.
title: Imiphumela Eyethulwa Ngomoya Ophansi

text:
Sanibonani, nonke. 

Isihloko sanamuhla sikhuluma ngokuxazulula inkinga. 

Sonke siyazi ukuthi ekuphileni kunezikhathi lapho sibhekana khona nezinkinga, futhi sonke siyazi ukuthi uma sizithola sikulezi zimo, kuba nzima ukucabanga ngokushesha ngezixazululo ezinhle. 

Ngakho-ke kubalulekile ukuthi uma sibhekane nezinkinga sime kancane, sidonse umoya, sizole bese sicabanga ngamakhono okuxazulula izinkinga esingawasebenzisa. 

Khumbula ukuhilela intsha yethu uma sixazulula izinkinga. Lokhu kuzoyisiza izimele futhi ifunde ukuxazulula izinkinga zayo esikhathini esizayo.
title: Ukuxazulula Inkinga

text:
Sanibonani, nonke. 

Isihloko sanamuhla sikhuluma ngokuphepha kwentsha. 

Kuwumthwalo wethu njengabazali ukuthi siqiniseka ukuthi intsha yethu iphephile ngaso sonke isikhathi. Kudingeka siqiniseka ukuthi intsha yethu iphephile emphakathini esihlala kuyo. Kuwumthwalo wethu ukuba sibenze baqaphele izindawo eziphephile nezingaphephanga emphakathini. 

Kubuye kube umthwalo wethu wemfanelo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iyaziqonda izingozi ezichaya kuzo uma iku-inthanethi. Ngaleyo ndlela intsha yethu izohlakanipha ikwazi ukwenza izinqumo ezinhle futhi izigcine iphephile.
title: Ukuphepha Kwentsha

text:
Sanibonani, nonke.

Isihloko sanamuhla simayelana nokubhekana nezinkinga.

Izinkinga zingavela nomaphi. Izinkinga zingavela noma nini. Ngakho-ke, kubalulekile ukuthi njengomndeni nibe nezinhlelo zokuthi nizokwenza kanjani uma ilunga lomndeni lizithola lisenkingeni. 

Kubalulekile ukuba nezinhlelo ukuze ilungu ngalinye lomndeni lizizwe livikelekile. 

Lapho sibhekele nenkinga, kumelwe sikhumbule ukuma, sidonse umoya, bese sizigcina sizolile. Lokho kuzokusiza ubhekane nenkinga ngendlela engcono.
title: Ukubhekana Nezinkinga

text:
Sanibonani nonke.

Isihloko sanamuhla ukuhalalisa kanye nezinyathelo ezilandelayo.

Bekumnandi, bekukuhle kakhulu ukuhamba nawe kulolu hambo. Namuhla sibungaza uhambo lwethu ndawonye. 

Namuhla sibungaza konke esikufundile kulo lonke uqeqesho.
title: Ukubungaza kanye Nezinyathelo Ezilandelayo

text:
Vala amehlo akho uphumule.

Cabanga ngokuphila komndeni wakho ngaphambi kokuba uqale uhambo lwakho nale-app.
       
Cabanga ngamakhono owafundile:
* Ukuzinakekela
* Isikhathi sokuthi nibe nobabili ndawonye
* Ukuncoma
* Iziqondiso ezinhle
* Ukulawula ukucindezeleka
* Isabelomali somndeni
* Imithetho
* Imiphumela eyethulwa ngomoya ophansi
* Ukuxazulula inkinga
* Ukuphepha kwentsha
* Ukubhekana nezinkinga

Cabanga ngohambo lwakho – bekunjani kuwe ukwenza lokhu:
* Yabelanani ngamacebiso nichaze izinto eniye nabhekana nazo
* Cabanga ufunde ezindabeni ezixoxwayo
* Phrakthiza amakhono nengane yakho eyevile eminyakeni eyishumi nambili

Ingabe kukhona okuye kwashintsha kuwe nasemndenini wakho?

Yini oyidingayo ukuze uqhubeke usebenzisa la makhono?
title: Cabanga
